content: this super chunky mesh overshirt is my way of getting my crojo back this summer i love a tiny yarn cotton lacey project as much as the next guy but without that instant gratification from quick chunky knits my crafting motivation always tends to waffle a bit in the middle of the summer with loopy mango s big cotton we can make a beachy coverup super fast and help get some of that crafting momentum restarted again please enjoy the free pattern and video tutorial
